ai-iti101:1.1_0: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
ai-iti101:2.1_0: “Mendicants, these four trifles are easy to find and are blameless.
ai-iti101:2.5_0: Lodgings at the root of a tree ...
ai-iti101:2.6_0: Taking the tonics, it’s easy to get these things.
ai-iti101:2.7_0: These four trifles are easy to find and are blameless.
ai-iti101:2.8_0: When a mendicant is content with trifles that are easy to find, they have one of the factors of the ascetic life, I say.”
ai-iti101:2.9_0: That is what the Buddha said.
ai-iti101:4.1_0: When the one who has explained the teachings
ai-iti101:4.3_0: They’re mastered by one who trains,
ai-iti101:4.4_0: for a mendicant who is diligent.”
ai-iti101:5.1_0: This too was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
